text: Tagra kazokzo eri'za vahe mani'nonanagi Rana tagri Anumzamoka kamefira huorami'nane. Kagra kavesi nerantenka, kasefa asimu tamiaza hunka, Pesia kini vahera hanke'za tazeri so'e nehu'za, tatarazageta mono noma ko'ma havizama hu'neana ete eme kiteta, Jerusalene Juda mopafina menina so'e hunka kva hurantanketa mani'none.
